verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:5
verses.text: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:6
verses.text: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:7
verses.text: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:8
verses.text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:9
verses.text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:
